My rating: 10/10 - Masterpiece

#1 Competitive FPS in the world.

Compared to other FPS games on the market, CS:GO is solely focused on competitive gaming with its hardcore nature. Economy management is crucial, game mechanics and physics are brutal, each small mistake is unforgivable and results in death. The more time you invest in this game the bigger will your knowledge be which is ultimately deciding factor for winning the match and ranking up. Series of complex angles, boost spots and knowledge of utilities is as important as the strategy implemented to win each round and you are not going to win rounds in this game on your own – teamwork is a must. The gameplay is very fast-paced and dynamic – hours turns to minutes.

PS.: Don’t fall into the skins addiction trap and think about the fact that buying a new house is probably a more reasonable option than that blue gem knife or Dragon Lore AWP skin.

i wouldn't recommend this game because as i see it, this game is for "getting better". Everyone sucks personality wise. Its just a bunch of douche bags who spend money on only fans. You'd expect nothing more though so when you actually muster up the courage to stand a little ground on office in some fucking corner called "paper" you begin to enjoy the game for what it is. A raw shooter specifically for precision and teamwork. Don't q alone but if you're new it's not like anyone actually wants to q with you so you have about 180 hours of constant shit. you being the shit. you'll probably try to convince 1 of your actually skilled friends to play with you during this time but don't. You're just being a selfish friend. You are a burden in this game for your first 500 hours.
